Rooms.Title: Room 1
Rooms.BaseDescription: Vivid description: The room is dark, with the faint hum of a distant radio emanating from the wall. The walls are covered in a layer of dust, obscuring the room's color. The room is silent, and the only sound is the faint hum that echoes from the walls. The room is warm and humid, with a faint, musty smell. The air is thick with the scent of dampness and decay. The room is narrow, with a small window on one side. The window is cracked, and the only light comes from a flickering lamp on the table. Rooms.Title: Neon Nights

Rooms.Title: Room 4
Rooms.BaseDescription: The room was dimly lit, with a faint humming sound that seemed to grow louder with every passing moment. The walls themselves were a faded shade of gray, with a few small cracks that seemed to show signs of age. The furniture, however, was mostly intact, with the exception of a single armchair that had been overturned and the legs bent backward. The chair itself was a pale grey, with a creaking back and a few spots of rust on the wood. The carpet beneath the chair was an unremarkable brown, with a few small cracks that seemed to have been there for a while. Rooms.Title: Room 5
Rooms.BaseDescription: The hum is so faint that it is nearly indistinguishable from the background noise. The room is empty, save for a single lamp, flickering dimly. The walls are bare, save for a single crack in the plaster. The only furniture is a single chair and a single table, both covered in a thin layer of dust. The only light source is a single lamp, which shines down into the room from above, casting a faded yellow glow on the walls and floor. The room smells of old age, and the only sound is the hum.

Rooms.Title: No Extra Information, No

StoryNodes.Title: A Tense Meeting
StoryNodes.Text: You encounter NPC1, a representative of The Collective, in Room 1. They seem guarded but willing to speak about recent events: Expose the corporation covering up illegal AI experiments

Choices.Label: Try to persuade them (appeal to empathy)

StoryNodes.Title: They Open Up
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 relaxes and shares a hint: 'There's a meeting at the old docks tonight. Someone from The Collective will be there.'

StoryNodes.Title: Threat Escalates
StoryNodes.Text: NPC1 narrows their eyes. The conversation ends badly; guards are alerted and you must flee.

StoryNodes.Title: You Walk Away
StoryNodes.Text: You decide not to press the issue. NPC1 watches you go, unreadable.

StoryNodes.Title: End
StoryNodes.Text: The conversation ends.
